name: Java

skills: Angular, React, Spring Batch, Docker, Oracle PLSQL, Java Persistence API, Java Collections Framework, Microservice, Spring Boot, Core Java, Spring MVC, J2EE, Multithreaded Programming, Cloud Computing, Java
summary:
Hello, thank you for visiting my profile.

I am a Java/AWS Expert with over 8 years of experience in IT, specializing in JAVA/J2EE-based
system design and development. I have successfully contributed to more than 30 projects for clients
across the globe, spanning diverse industries such as Automotive, Fin Tech, Sales & Distribution, and the
Pharma domain.

Feel free to get in touch with me. I will make sure that our expertise is a great fit. If it is, I will start by
understanding your requirements through detailed discussions. This will enable us to collaborate
effectively towards achieving your business objectives.

I can assist you with a range of Java development services,
 Web Application Development
 Java Backed Development (Rest/Soap API)
 Enterprise Java Application Development
 Modernization of Java Applications
 Java Maintenance & Support
 Migration of the Java Application from On-premise to Cloud platform and vice versa
 Database design, development and optimization

Below is my primary experience and skillet for your reference:

➡ Having expertise in the Healthcare, Automobile, Finance and sales & distribution to provide domain-
specific solutions.
➡Experience with Agile Development Methodology and JIRA and confluence tools.
➡Project lead experience and carrying out all phases of full SDLC Lifecycle Enterprise system
development for projects.
➡Experience and Expertise include Business Requirement Gathering, Requirement Mapping, GAP
analysis, Functional, architecture, Solution Design, and Proof of Concept.
➡Having proven working experience in AWS architecture.
➡Working experience in the Monolithic and Microservices architecture
➡Strong understanding of software design patterns, best practices, software development
methodologies, and object-oriented programming
➡Proficient in Java frameworks and technologies such as Spring, Hibernate, Angular/React, etc.
➡Experience with designing and developing scalable, high-performance enterprise systems
➡Excellent problem-solving and troubleshooting skills, with a focus on integration challenges
➡Solid understanding of Agile development principles and experience working in Agile environments
➡Strong interpersonal and communication skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively with clients
➡Designing and developing integration solutions using technologies like Apache Camel and Spring
Integration to achieve seamless data flow and system integration

✨ Technology Stack

✔Key Skills:
Spring Core, Spring MVC, Spring Boot, Microservices Architecture, JPA, Hibernate, JSP, Servlet, Struts,
Angular/React, and Docker

✔Programming Languages: Java /J2EE, PL/SQL

✔Application /Web Servers:
Tomcat, WebLogic, WebSphere, and Jeus &Web2B and Nginx

Eclipse IDE, STS, SVN, GIT, Jenkins, Nexus and Postman

MySQL, Oracle, MS SQL, and Postgres

✔Integration Tools:
Apache Camel, Spring Integration, and EAI (Web Method)

✔Integration:
Google Maps, Google Rating, Payment Gateways, PayTo, , Jira and Apache Camel & Spring Integration

✔Cloud Technologies:
AWS (EC2, S3, SNS, SQS, Lambda, RDS and API Gateway, ECS, Faregate, Bean Stack, Amazon Kinesis )

✔Streaming & Message Broker:
Rabit MQ, ActiveMQ, Kafka and JMS

✔Container Knowledge:
Docker and Docker Swarm: Containerization and orchestration.

✔Source Control & CI/CD:
GIT, Subvisual, Jenkins, etc.

✔Methodologies:
Agile (Scrum/ Kanban), Waterfall Microservices Service Discovery, API Gateway, Circuit Breaker & Fault
Tolerance (resilience4j), Saga, CQRS, Log aggregation and API Composition

✔Testing
Selenium, Tosca, Test Rail, Apache ZAP, Browser Stack, Postman, JUnit, Mockito.

✔Project Management Tools: Jira, Monday.com

Look forward to working with You.

name: BlockChain
title: Sr. Blockchain Developer, NFT | Solana | Rust | Golang | ERC404
skills: Solana, Solidity, Rust, Ethereum, DeFi, Blockchain, Blockchain, NFT & Cryptocurrency, NFT Marketplace, Web3, Ethers.js, Hardhat, Golang, OpenAI API, GPT-4 API, ChatGPT
summary:
As a seasoned Blockchain/NFT/Web3 Engineer, Full Stack Developer, and Cloud Data/Solution Architect, I bring over 8 years of comprehensive IT experience, with the last 3 years deeply focused on the fascinating realm of Blockchain, Ethereum, FLOW, Solana, NFT, and Web3 technologies. My expertise spans Solidity, RUST, C++ programming languages, token generation, digital currency exchange, and proof of work (POW), through which I’ve delivered innovative, robust, and feature-rich blockchain solutions.

In addition to my blockchain endeavors, I possess over 5 years of experience in Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, and Computer Vision, leveraging tools and platforms such as Python, AWS, MS Azure Machine Learning, Google Cloud Platform, and Amazon SageMaker. My proficiency extends to building and training custom data models with OpenAI’s ChatGPT, incorporating Q&A, summarization features, and integrating AI and ChatGPT models with various applications, enhancing conversational data analytics and AI chatbots using platforms like Vicuna, AWS Lex, and Dialogflow.

My portfolio showcases a range of projects from blockchain developments and NFT marketplaces to past web projects, highlighting my capability to deliver complex solutions across various domains. My clientele includes top-tier companies, including Google, and spans start-ups to Fortune 500, demonstrating my adaptability to diverse team settings, including international and distributed teams.

Key skills include AI and machine learning tools (ChatGPT, RAG, OpenAI, Generative AI, LangChain, LLM, Pinecone, Vicuna, Llama2, BARD, Vertex AI, Vector Embedding), programming languages (Python, Solidity, Cadence, Rust, C++), blockchain and Web3 development tools (Web3.js, Node.js, React, Truffle, Ganache, MetaMask), and proficiency in NLP, DevOps, cloud platforms, and automation tools.

I’m committed to innovation and architecting profitable solutions, evidenced by my membership in Upwork Talent Enterprise Clouds, where clients regularly engage my services. I offer favorable hourly rates for long-term projects and retainer consulting, ensuring value-driven partnerships for groundbreaking solutions.

name: Rust
title: Rust Developer - Blockchain | Web
skills: Golang, Web Development, Rust, API Development, Layer 2 Blockchain, Business Logic Layer, Blockchain, NFT & Cryptocurrency, Blockchain, Functional Prototype, Blockchain Development Framework, WebAssembly, Solana, Smart Contract, API Documentation, Blockchain Development
summary:
⚡Are you looking to create a blockchain application?
⚡Are you looking to create a complex web application that is elegant and performant?
⚡Do you prioritise quality over quantity?

If you are, then I am the perfect technology partner for you! 💸💸💸

✨ How can I help you with your blockchain application? ✨
I can create smart contracts to an entire blockchain tailored to your application - the exact solution will depend on your project. I mostly work in the solana and cosmos ecosystems but due to my strong blockchain fundamentals I can create applications on any chain, even the most obscure ones. If your blockchain project is complex and is not just minting NFT's, then I will be a good fit.

✨ How can I help you with your web application? ✨
I specialise on complex web applications that cannot be created using a content management system or static site generator. If your looking to create a prototype I can create it all by myself, you will not need to hire multiple developers for frontend, backend and devops. I create web applications using the "Rust" programming language ensuring that your application has no security issues and has top tier performance. If your web application is created using "Rust", I can help fix or modify it based on your requirement.

✨ When would I be a great fit? ✨
You are looking for a solana blockchain developer
You are looking for a web application prototyper
You are looking for a rust developer
You care about clean code

✨ When would I not be a great fit? ✨
You want to sell NFT's that have no real use case
”Respect for others” is not a core value for you

✨ Why choose me over someone else? ✨
Client Reviews - I focus on providing value to all of my clients and earning their trust.
Over-Delivering - My focus is on giving more than what I expect to receive.
Responsiveness - Will respond to any messages immediately or in a few hours.

No matter what software I make for you I will make sure its of the best quality. I pride myself on my ability to write elegant code. I will exploit all the features of whatever programming language I use to come up with the most performant and easy to maintain code. I am well versed with design patterns and will use the most fitting design pattern based on the situation.

You can find some of my previous work @ github.com/shravanshetty1

Sound like a good fit? 👌
If you are interested in working together or just want to chat about your upcoming project, feel free to hit the "Invite to Job" button in the top right hand corner, write a brief description of your project or idea and I'll be in touch as soon as possible.

Looking forward to working with you 😊!







Some additional info about me -

I do most of my software development with the "Rust" programming language. I ❤️‍🔥 the Rust programming language 🦀. I have tried various programming languages and rust is by far my favourite - Its the only programming language that allows me to build anything in software from full stack web apps. embedded systems, operating systems, games .etc. It has the performance of a low level programming language like C/C++ while having the developer experience of high level programming language such as C#/Golang .etc. If you are looking for a rustacean, you have found one!

Following is a brief description of my development environment. I use Ubuntu as my operating system. I use Intellij IDEA community edition as my IDE, with the VIM plugin to ensure I am editing code in the fastest possible way. My IDE has various plugins that help with intellisense, linting and formatting. I also use various tools such as github copilot to get AI generated recommendation which speeds up my programming drastically.


🔥 Blockchain technologies I am familiar with 🔥

Smart contract types -
✔️ Solana smart contracts
✔️ CosmWasm smart contracts - used in terra and other cosmos based chains

Blockchain development framework -
✔️ Cosmos-sdk - used to build cosmos compatible chains such as terra
